parameters.name: AssetType
parameters.description: The cloud service whose configuration check results you want to query. For more information about the check items for the cloud service, see the check item table in the "Response parameters" section of this topic.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The type of the check item that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **1**: identity authentication and permissions
*   **2**: network access control
*   **3**: log audit
*   **4**: data security
*   **5**: monitoring and alerting
*   **6**: basic security protection

> If you do not specify this parameter, all types of check items are queried.

parameters.name: ItemIds
parameters.description: An array that consists of the IDs of check items. For more information about the check item, see the check item table in the "Response parameters" section of this topic.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the check item. For more information about the check item, see the check item table in the "Response parameters" section of this topic.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: QueryFlag
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the check item is supported by the edition of Security Center that you purchase. Valid values:

*   **enabled**: yes
*   **disabled**: no

parameters.name: RiskLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level of the check item that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **high**
*   **medium**
*   **low**

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the check results. Valid values:

*   **pass**
*   **failed**
*   **running**
*   **waiting**
*   **ignored**
*   **falsePositive**
